about.title: About
about.content: HIRICH Oussama, a third-year Bachelor's student at ESGI Paris specializing in Web Engineering. I am a Next.js developer with two years of experience in web development.

items.position: Web Developer at Prime-Environnement, Bobigny, France
items.description: Development of websites (Tailwind CSS, React, JavaScript, PHP) and landing pages. Implementation of REST APIs, SEO optimization.
Development of websites (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP) and WordPress CMS. Creation of social media advertisements.
Fundamentals of Linux, version control tools and best coding practices, algorithms, web integration (HTML5, CSS3, jQuery), PHP8 - MVC from scratch, JavaScript, CMS overview.
Software Solutions and Business Applications. Development and management of applications.
Life and Earth Sciences, with honors.
